participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Insecure yet passionate, Emma finds solace in her hobbies and loves caring for her pets.
participant_1.background: i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion. i've a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and practical, James is excited about his growing family and loves to learn new things.
participant_2.background: i am expecting twins in two months. a already have a children. i just bought my first home. i work at a bank.

content.text: I just remembered. I love to bake, I am a baker
